title: RT News - October 05, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: Protestors clash with police on the streets of the Ecuadorian capital as the government ditches fuel subsidies to meet the terms of an IMF loan. The US State Department approves the sale of millions of dollars worth of anti-tank missiles to Ukraine with the country proving to be a rich source of money, scandal and political intrigue for the US. American presidential hopeful Bernie Sanders declares 'war on the super rich' and gets massive public support, and more surprisingly from Facebook's billionaire founder Mark Zuckerberg. But we ask people on the streets of New York if the 'one per cent' will ever be seen as an 'oppressed minority' though.
description: Protestors clash with police on the streets of the Ecuadorian capital as the government ditches fuel subsidies to meet the terms of an IMF loan
